channel.title: Randomly stopping when walking (Hybrid Pvp v3 source)
channel.description: I posted this before, but nobody answered me and I'm rather sure that thread is going to die. On multiple servers whenever I walk, I stop every 3 steps or so and start walking again. It's pretty annoying and I'm not sure what is causing it. I'm currently using Hybrid Pvp v3 source, which didn't use to do it, and now it is as well. I'm hosting it on a 2gb ram 500gb bandwidth vps. Server side I get the error "Invalid waypoint in walking queue" multiple times and client side I get Error: T1 123,0 - 36,36 I don't know if either one of those are relevant, but I figure the more information I add the more likely someone will know what's going on.

item.title: Randomly stopping when walking (Hybrid Pvp v3 source)
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Brutal I am Brutal
item.description:
@I_am_Brutal wrote:

When I log in I get horrible lag, and then it seems to go away for the most part, other than walking.
Previously, I got pretty much no lag at all.

Read full topic
item.source: Randomly stopping when walking (Hybrid Pvp v3 source)

item.title: Randomly stopping when walking (Hybrid Pvp v3 source)
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

does it lagg

most likely your source has alot of memory leaks which cause your server to lagg.

Read full topic
